title: Sentinel password is logged without REDACTED
body:
Ruby version: 3.2.2
Rails version: 7.0.8
Sidekiq / Pro / Enterprise version(s): 7.2.0

Please include your initializer, sidekiq.yml, and any error message with the full backtrace.
config/initializers/sidekiq.rb
```
Sidekiq.configure_server do |config|
  config.redis = {db: 3,
    username: 'redisuser', password: 'redispassword',
    sentinel_username: 'sentineluser', sentinel_password: 'sentinelpassword',
    sentinels: [
      {host: 'sentcache-db-1', port: 26379},
      {host: 'sentcache-db-2', port: 26379},
      {host: 'sentcache-db-3', port: 26379}
    ],
    name: 'my-master',
    role: :master}
end
Sidekiq.configure_client do |config|
  config.redis = {db: 3,
    username: 'redisuser', password: 'redispassword',
    sentinel_username: 'sentineluser', sentinel_password: 'sentinelpassword',
    sentinels: [
      {host: 'sentcache-db-1', port: 26379},
      {host: 'sentcache-db-2', port: 26379},
      {host: 'sentcache-db-3', port: 26379}
    ],
    name: 'my-master',
    role: :master}
end
```

Log output:
```
2023-11-10T18:22:38.498Z pid=29323 tid=j5v INFO: Sidekiq 7.2.0 connecting to Redis with options {:size=>10, :pool_name=>"internal", :db=>3, :username=>"redisuser", :password=>"REDACTED", :sentinel_username=>"sentineluser", :sentinel_password=>"sentinelpassword", :sentinels=>[{:host=>"sentcache-db-1", :port=>26379}, {:host=>"sentcache-db-2", :port=>26379}, {:host=>"sentcache-db-3", :port=>26379}], :name=>"my-master", :role=>:master"}
```

We expect to see `:sentinel_password=>"REDACTED"` in the logs.
